title: MASCOT DISASTERS PANTHEON: Are mascots having a moment?
description:
Welcome to the Shutdown Fullcast, the world's only college football podcast, only Bill Simmons podcast, and only Ringer NBA podcast.
Today we're discussing:
An American rite of passage: having to sweat in a pig costume on a 95-degree day
Seriously, were all of you Piggly Wiggly mascots as kids
What to do when Hank Aaron sees you nude
What to do when you are a nude Willie the Wildcat
The Deontay Wilder entrance costume of dangerously slapped-together dragon mascots
"My mom managed a Big Dog Sportswear. Governor Schwarzenegger was coming to the mall."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
